item.title: Web3 Usage (Backend-Golang)
item.description: Preface I’ve completed two DAPPs so far last year, and I have some knowledge of Web3, and this is a record of the usage of the backend library go-web3. Web3 Usage (Front-end) Web3 Usage (Backend-PHP) Installation 1 2 3 go get github.com/chenzhijie/go-web3 go get github.com/chenzhijie/go-web3/types go get github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/common Provider Initialization 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 var rpcHost = "https://bsc-dataseed1.
